actions.name: cancel_booking
actions.description: Cancel an existing booking. Returns true on success.

actions.name: create_booking_comment
actions.description: Set a comment for a booking

actions.name: create_booking
actions.description: Create a new booking using the book API method. Returns appointment info or throws exception if time not available.

actions.name: create_client
actions.description: Add a new client with specified data. Email, phone, or both may be required (check company settings).

actions.name: create_detailed_report
actions.description: Generate a detailed report (metrics, bookings, revenue)

actions.name: create_note
actions.description: Create a note (generic) in the system

actions.name: find_booking
actions.description: Returns list of bookings filtered by given parameters

actions.name: find_client
actions.description: Returns list of clients associated with company. Search by phone number, email address, or name.

actions.name: find_invoice
actions.description: Find invoices with filters and pagination

triggers.name: booking_canceled
triggers.description: Triggers when a booking is canceled in SimplyBook.me

triggers.name: booking_changed
triggers.description: Triggers when a booking is changed in SimplyBook.me

triggers.name: new_booking
triggers.description: Triggers when a new booking is created in SimplyBook.me

triggers.name: new_client
triggers.description: Triggers when a new client is added (via booking or manually) in SimplyBook.me

triggers.name: new_invoice
triggers.description: Triggers when a new invoice is generated/paid in SimplyBook.me (requires Accept Payments feature)

triggers.name: new_offer
triggers.description: Triggers when a new offer (proposal or quote) is created (bookings with promo: false)
